passive.name: Treasure
passive.description: Increases the wearer's Effect RES by <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong>. If the wearer is attacked and has no Shield, they gain a Shield equal to <orangeStrong>{{2, percent}}%</orangeStrong> of their Max HP for {{3}} turn(s). This effect can only be triggered once every {{4}} turn(s). If the wearer has a Shield when attacked, the DMG they receive decreases by <orangeStrong>{{5, percent}}%</orangeStrong>.
